name: More Drink More Drunk
description:
Our man John B Carker II had only just stepped off a steam ship from the U. S. of A onto British soil when he witnessed a most terrifying event, an alien abduction (or something)! Confused and fearful, he seeks the comfort of booze to temper these terrible memories. An epic pub crawl across a quaint English town should be just what the doctor ordered. Hopefully, things don’t get too out of control!

---

Controls:

Click and drag LMB to move and Click RMB to zoom the camera out.
